name: Gambling Gmae
description:
A game about gambling or something I don't really know what I was going for.

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Interact

Escape - Leave the machine

Everything else - mouse click

How to play:

Go to the orange box, click space to go inside, go to the blue machine and click to see if you are lucky. Go back to the first scene to buy water or food. You can see your water and food in the top right part of the screen. If it shrinks to much - game over. Good luck.
